The height and width of the game area.
size - Variable in class asteroids.participants.Asteroid
The size of the asteroid (0 = small, 1 = medium, 2 = large)
smallSaucerClip - Variable in class sounds.SoundDemo
A Clip that, when played repeatedly, sounds like a small saucer flying
SoundDemo - Class in sounds
Demonstrates how to put sound files into a project so that they will be included when the project is exported, and demonstrates how to play sounds.
